title: Space helicopters will help us explore Mars and other worlds. Here's how.
body: When NASA scientists were planning the Mars Perseverance mission, they decided to try something new: Instead of just sending a rover, they'd also send up a small helicopter.
author: Rebecca Sohn

title: Amazon tests machine learning software to analyze satellite images from space
body: For the past 10 months, Amazon has been testing a machine learning software in space that can analyze Earth observation images on its own and send only the best ones to Earth.
author: Tereza Pultarova

title: What is a geosynchronous orbit?
body: Geosynchronous orbits are vital to a wide array of technology allowing satellites to travel in sync with Earth as it rotates. We explore it in more detail here.
author: Robert Lea
